board.home-description: <0>Howhow</0> is a company that connects brands to influencers, end long waits for campaigns or emails. Our centralized system accelerates influencer marketing, boosting results.
board.about-title: A little bit of our history
board.about-description: Howhow reinvents the interaction between brands and influencers. Our platform centralizes and accelerates all phases of influencer marketing campaigns, making collaboration efficient and effective. With Howhow, every connection counts.
board.steps-description: Creating and managing a marketing campaign on our platform is easy!
board.step-1-description: Research, filter, and create personalized lists with thousands of influencers. View their profiles, numbers, statistics, previous projects, costs, and other information to find the ideal profiles for your campaign.
board.step-1-short-description: Research, filter, and create personalized lists with thousands of influencers. View their profiles, numbers...
board.step-2-description: Access the profiles of various influencers and get real-time detailed information, such as preferences, numbers, and previous work.
board.step-2-short-description: Access the profiles of various influencers and get real-time detailed information...
board.step-3-description: Track the progress of your campaign, have a detailed history of each influencer's process, whether they have accepted the proposal, signed the contract, submitted the video for review, and monitor campaign statistics from start to finish.
board.step-3-short-description: Track the progress of your campaign, have a detailed history of each influencer's process, whether they have accepted the proposal...
